metadata.title: CVE-2017-6363 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** In the GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) through 2.2.5, thereis a heap-based buffer over-read in tiffWriter in gd_tiff.c. NOTE: thevendor says "In my opinion this issue should not have a CVE, since the GDand GD2 formats are documented to be 'obsolete, and should only be used fordevelopment and testing purposes.'"

criterions.comment: libwmf package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
